description: Fava Pot is a fantastic food truck in the DC area serving Egyptian/Mediterranean food, while supporting orphaned girls' education in Egypt. Doing good deeds doesn't mean sacrificing great taste or quality, though. Ingredients are simple, with fava beans, Cornish hen, potatoes, veggies an fruits, olive oil, and almonds and dates, and with these simple tools the eco-friendly truck makes meals you won't forget.Stop by Fava Pot and check out the falafel, kofta, kabob, and more!
name: Fava Pot
